forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. South southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain between 9pm and 10pm, then a slight chance of snow between 10pm and 11pm, then a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 48. South wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a low around 42. Southeast wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 38, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Freezing Rain then Rain Showers Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain between 10pm and midnight, then rain showers likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 7pm, then rain. Cloudy, with a low around 36. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

forecast.name: This Afternoon

Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for classic and skate ski today, March 2, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Due to the warm, rainy weather, trails have deteriorated and are not suitable for skiing.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Was skiing classical with waxless (fish scale) skis.  Tracks where in surprisingly good shape.  Tracks were set for the entire length of Buck's Run  including connector.  Quite a few skaters out---seemed like they were going a little slower than usual.    Many Kudos to the groomers!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Red and Blue loops are hard packed and fast with a light skiff of new . There is some wind debris: but no more than minor agility training . LF 7

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5  lifts, the Space Worm, and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Saturday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: The sun is out, the wind is light and the temperature is comfortable for skiing. The coverage on slopes continues to be very good with excellent grooming from our dedicated Crew. The XC trails and snowshoe trails still have plenty of natural snow. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
